snippet: Pinterest, the most talked about start-up of the spring, lets users curate photographs online, essentially making scrapbooks that link back to the original source of each image.
abstract: Pinterest, most talked about start-up of the spring, lets users curate photographs online, essentially making scrapbooks that link back to the original source of each image; company is growing exponentially, with 16.1 million unique visitors in January, double its number in November 2011.
lead_paragraph: Pinterest, the most talked about start-up of the spring, lets users curate photographs online, essentially making scrapbooks that link back to the original source of each image.

headline.seo: Pinterest Aims at the Collector Hidden Inside All of Us
headline.main: A Site That Aims to Unleash the Scrapbook Maker in All of Us
headline.print_headline: A Site That Aims to Unleash the Scrapbook Maker in All of Us
